acceptance.description: By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service, our Privacy Policy, and our Ruleset.

sections.heading: General Terms
items: FREE2RP LLC reserves the right to change, modify, or update these ToS at any time without prior notice.
We reserve the right to terminate, suspend, or modify our services, or any portion thereof, at any time.
We are not responsible for any damages or losses incurred as a result of using our services.
FREE2RP is not affiliated with Rockstar or any entity associated with the Grand Theft Auto series.

sections.heading: Prohibited Conduct
items: You may not use our services for any illegal or unauthorized purpose.
Harassment, threats, or intimidation of other players is strictly prohibited.
Exploiting bugs or glitches is not allowed. Report issues immediately to our staff.
You may not claim ownership of any materials from GTA 5 or FiveM.
You must be at least 18 years of age to play on our server.

sections.heading: Refund Policy
items: All purchases made through our Tebex store are final and non-refundable.
Chargebacks may result in a permanent ban from our server.

sections.heading: Disclaimer of Warranties
items: No warranties, express or implied, are made regarding the accuracy or reliability of our services.
We do not guarantee that our services will be error-free or uninterrupted.
FREE2RP LLC is not responsible for any damages or losses incurred as a result of using our services.

sections.heading: Limitation of Liability
items: We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.
Our liability shall not exceed the amount paid for our services.

sections.heading: Indemnification
items: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless FREE2RP LLC from any claims arising out of your use of our services.

sections.heading: Governing Law
items: These ToS are governed by the laws of the United States and the State of California.

sections.heading: Entire Agreement
items: These ToS, along with our Privacy Policy and Ruleset, constitute the entire agreement between you and FREE2RP LLC.
